thread.title: Craig, Oyelowo to star in 'Othello' off-Broadway production
thread.title_full: Craig, Oyelowo to star in 'Othello' off-Broadway production | CP24.com

author: The Associated Press
title: Craig, Oyelowo to star in 'Othello' off-Broadway production
text:
NEW YORK -- A couple of big-time movie stars will be appearing off-Broadway next fall when Daniel Craig and David Oyelowo appear in a production of William Shakespeare's "Othello" at New York Theatre Workshop.
Sam Gold, a Tony-winner for "Fun Home" will direct the tragedy, with "Selma" star Oyelowo playing the title role and super spy 007 Craig as Iago. The show is slated for fall 2016 and additional casting will be announced later.
Until then, Craig plays James Bond in "Spectre" out next month and Oyelowo is next slated to co-star with Zoe Saldana in "Nina" about late singer Nina Simone.
